Room.Name: East Uland Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Uland Way, a very old carriage road, just east of Rum Road.
Room.LongDescription: The way meanders through a small settlement of rickity shacks and rundown shops. The Cold Drake Inn is on the south side of the way, and a bed and breakfast establishment is tucked behind some banana trees to the north. East Uland Way continues toward the island's bluff on the eastern side.
